comments.body: Will this implementation EVER get called? It looks like, even if flex volume plugin is installed on the controller, the code still returns a no-op version of flex plugin.
nvm. looks like it works as expected. thanks.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +24,28 @@)

func (plugin *flexVolumePlugin) ExpandVolumeDevice(spec *volume.Spec, newSize resource.Quantity, oldSize resource.Quantity) (resource.Quantity, error) {
	call := plugin.NewDriverCall(expandVolumeCmd)
	call.AppendSpec(spec, plugin.host, nil)
